citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 AM on 26 July
2022.
Knocked on door-no answer. Called-no answer. Was able to reach owners by text-owners not available to conduct
inspection today.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 AM on 26 July 
2022. 
 
Knocked on door-no answer. Called-no answer. Was able to reach owners by text-owners not available to conduct 
inspection today. 
 
 
 
End Section
